Via

Introduction

Via is an Indonesian singer-songwriter and rapper under Na Entertainment. She is a member of the upcoming global girl group NWH:I. She is also a former member of the girl group Beauty Box and a former pre-debut member of the girl group MEP-C formed through the training platform Universe.
